name: Snoway (Pixalake)
description:
Winter is not the 12 months season but you can have the fun of doing snowboarding with Snoway.

Your snowboard is ready to make your way on endless snowy hills, so start your journey on the top of the mountain. but beware of your enemies because they are on your way to stop you.

Avoid all of the enemies and collect coins to unlock new characters.

Try all of three characters to see their ability on the hills.
